title: Aircraft

quoteFirst: Upon emerging from them at seventeen minutes past one, I tried to take a view of their surface with the camera, but the balloon was ascending too rapidly and spiraling too quickly to allow me to do so. The height of two miles was reached at
quoteLast: . The temperature of the air had fallen to 32 degrees and the dew-point to 26 degrees. The third mile was passed at twenty-eight minutes past one, with an air temperature of 18 degrees, and a dew-point of 13 degrees.
title:
Wonderful Balloon Ascents; Or, The Conquest of the Skies
A History of Balloons and Balloon Voyages
author: Marion, Fulgence

quoteLast: sighted the submarine on the surface, and gave chase. The "sub" submerged 500 yards ahead. Dropping two depth-charges, the _McDougal_ circled around the spot, and soon noticed oil rising, apparently from the U-boat.
title: Our Navy at war
author: Daniels, Josephus, 1862-1948
